results.original_title: The Cat in the Hat
results.overview: During a rainy day, and while their mother is out, Conrad and Sally, and their pet fish, are visited by the mischievous Cat in the Hat. Fun soon turns to mayhem, and the siblings must figure out how to rid themselves of the maniacal Cat.
results.title: The Cat in the Hat

results.original_title: The Cat in the Hat
results.overview: In a marvelously animated version of one of the most beloved of all Dr. Seuss tales, two youngsters find themselves at home with nothing to do on a rainy afternoon. But when the magical, mischievous Cat in the Hat arrives on the scene, they're all cat-apulted into a day of rousing, romping, outlandish antics they - and you - will never forget!
results.title: The Cat in the Hat

results.original_title: The Grinch Grinches the Cat in the Hat
results.overview: The Cat in the Hat is all set for a lovely picnic, but the evil Grinch changes his plans by inventing a contraption that captures noise and makes it sound ferocious. The Cat has to save the world from the clutches of the Grinch and the only way to do it is to reach Grinch's soft spot.
results.title: The Grinch Grinches the Cat in the Hat

results.original_title: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About Christmas!
results.overview: The Cat in the Hat, Sally, Nick and Fish help a baby reindeer find its way home in time for Christmas.
results.title: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About Christmas!

results.original_title: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About Camping!
results.overview: It's the first day of Summer Vacation and The Cat in the Hat whisks Nick, Sally and Fish off on the greatest great outdoor camping adventure ever!
results.title: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About Camping!

results.original_title: The Cat in the Hat: Live Show
results.title: The Cat in the Hat: Live Show

results.original_title: The Cat in the Hat: Let's Celebrate!
results.overview: Come one, come all, come Celebrate! With the Cat in the Hat you've got a date! When the Cat eats the last chocolate Nick and Sally must fly to Coco-a-licious to restock their supply. But princess Lotta-Chocka's helpers are away. Can the Cat and the kids help make chocolate today? You bet they can - the best chocolate you've seen! And to make it they start with a small bitter bean.
results.title: The Cat in the Hat: Let's Celebrate!

results.original_title: The Cat in the Hat: Surprise, Little Guys!
results.overview: Press the shrinkamadoodle - a new adventure begins! With The Cat in the Hat and his tiny new friends! Flitter and fly with the fireflies at night; Visit Larry the Limpet, watch him hold on tight! Learn how earthworms help the flowers to grow, Follow a little bird as he flits to and fro. Shrink down to a size that's smaller than small, And meet the creatures we can't see at all! Includes these stories: Super Secret Digger, Night Lights, Along Came a Spider, Teeny Weeny Adventure, Hold on Tight,
results.title: The Cat in the Hat: Surprise, Little Guys!

results.original_title: The Cat in the Hat: Safari So Good
results.overview: It's time for a safari, come and explore with the Cat and his friends on adventures galore. Reach for the treetops and swing through the trees, walk like giraffes and swing like monkeys! Join the Cat in the Hat on this brand new safari adventure! Help him find the missing stripes for his hat, swing with silly monkeys and discover how footprints are made!
results.title: The Cat in the Hat: Safari So Good

results.original_title: The Cat in the Hat : Told From the Cold
results.overview: Come join in the fun, on new adventures we go, With The Cat in the Hat and his friends all in tow! Discover how water can turn into snow, That penguins don't fly but, boy can they go! Black bears get ready for a very long sleep, Before the weather gets cold and the snow is too deep.
results.title: The Cat in the Hat : Told From the Cold

results.original_title: The Cat In The Hat Knows A Lot About Halloween!
results.overview: The Cat in the Hat takes Nick and Sally on the craziest Halloween adventure, where they go to the Oooky-ma-kooky Closet to help find Nick and Sally the best Halloween costumes ever.
results.title: The Cat In The Hat Knows A Lot About Halloween!

results.original_title: The Cat In The Hat Knows A Lot About Space!
results.overview: The Cat in the Hat joins Nick and Sally who are exploring the backyard when something extraordinary finds them-a flying robotic dog. The robot lands and does some exploring of his own, gulping up rock samples and photographing the Cat, Nick, Sally, and Fish before blasting off back into space. What was that thing? Where did it come from? Where is it going? The Cat in the Hat fires up his Space-ama-racer and whisks Nick, Sally and Fish off on a cosmic adventure in search of the robot. Together, they survive a dust storm on the surface of Mars, rocket through an asteroid belt, and then narrowly escape being sucked into Jupiter by its huge gravitational pull. Ultimately, they hitch a ride on a comet that leads them all safely back to the Space Station, along with plenty of space samples, and stories and even a small souvenir that follows The Cat in the Hat and our crew back to Earth.
results.title: The Cat In The Hat Knows A Lot About Space!

results.original_title: The Cat in the Hat: Show & Tell Sure is Swell!
results.overview: Summer is over, and Fall is now here. Let's go back to school - the best time of the year! Featuring five episodes: Spring and Summer, Fall and Winter, Amazing Eyes, Hooray for Hair, and When I Grow Up.
results.title: The Cat in the Hat: Show & Tell Sure is Swell!

results.original_title: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot about That!: Wings and Things
results.overview: Why do birds migrate? Why do some animals sleep during the day and wake up at night? And where does honey come from? The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That!, so let's hop in the Thing-a-majigger and Go! Go! Go! on an adventure!! The Cat takes his young friends exploring all around the world, learning about bees, birds, and other critters. From the beach to the skies, The Cat in the Hat shows how it's perfectly natural to explore the world. Just as Dr. Seuss helped generations of children to read, The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That! allows young ones to explore nature and science!
results.title: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot about That!: Wings and Things

results.original_title: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That! Space is the Place
results.overview: Join the Cat in the Hat on a trip into space- and learn why the cosmos are such a cool place! Visit each of the planets, the sun and the stars. The red one near Earth? It's the planet called Mars! Learn why day turns to night thanks to our friend, the sun. And why balls hit on the moon are always a home run!
results.title: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That! Space is the Place

results.original_title: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That! Breeze from the Trees
results.overview: Three stories from the series The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That.  Follow along as The Cat in the Hat explores the world and helps others in the stories: Nest Best Thing, The Lost Egg, and The Tree Doctor.
results.title: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That! Breeze from the Trees

results.original_title: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That!: Hurray! It's Valentine's Day!
results.overview: It's Valentine's Day with The Cat in the Hat, A great time for you to make friends with the Cat. Spend the whole day with your wonderful friends In a place where adventure and fun never ends. Yes, friendship's the key on this special day, And the Cat is the one who will lead the way. Join The Cat in the Hat as he celebrates friendship with his closest friends, Nick, Sally, Fish, the Things and...YOU!
results.title: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That!: Hurray! It's Valentine's Day!

results.original_title: Cat in the Hat: Tricks and Treats
results.overview: A new spooky adventure this DVD brings, with The Cat, Nick and Sally, Fish and the Things. Meet the eeriest critters you have ever seen, arrived just in time for this Halloween! There will be lots of tricks and, of course lots of treats, to share with the animal friends you will meet! There's a coconut crab, spider monkeys and bats, and plenty more fun with The Cat in the Hat!
results.title: Cat in the Hat: Tricks and Treats

results.original_title: Cat in the Hat: Up & Away
results.overview: Zoom up and away in the Thinga-ma-jigger! The Cat in the Hat is always ready to help his friends explore the world. Why, you ask? Well, because The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That, of course! When Sally and Nick need help with a song, Humphrey the Humpback Whale teaches them how whales make beautiful music. And when Sally wants to pick flowers for her mom, The Cat and his friends travel to the rain forest to meet different creatures that all depend on flowers to live. Just as Dr. Seuss helped generations of children to read, The cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That encourages your little one to explore natural science!
results.title: Cat in the Hat: Up & Away

results.original_title: The Cat That Hated People
results.overview: A much-abused cat really hates living with people, so decides to go to the moon for some peace and quiet.
results.title: The Cat That Hated People
